## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7a1940e473e85340855b988ae41ca9c65a1c1e2ee81c63e96329b35b605b6405)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'aauto-assign-team-action' @ 0.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
